snippet: The average attendee of the Austin, Tex., festival was a single, 31-year-old man making $83,000 a year who most likely has more Twitter and Facebook friends than you do, according to one recent analysis.
abstract: The average attendee of the Austin, Tex., festival was a single, 31-year-old man making $83,000 a year who most likely has more Twitter and Facebook friends than you do, according to one recent analysis.

headline.main: Digital Notes: Who Attends South by Southwest? Let Us Draw You a Picture
